1438160.name: The Jackbox Party Pack 7 - Soundtrack
1438160.description: Oh no! The Jackbox Games Factory accidentally pressed its first run of The Jackbox Party Pack 7 without including any coding, art, voice-over or sound effects! So we're offering you this ONE TIME OPPORTUNITY to purchase all that's left: The Jackbox Party Pack 7 Soundtrack! It's like the audiobook version, but with musical notes instead of words! It's the greatest video game you'll ever... HEAR!
